experience.title: Social Sector Manager
experience.description: -The internship was offered directly by professor Bryan Cassady as a result of excellence in the course taken under him.-Designed the training program that could be run in social organizations based on the challenges they encounter.-Developed the new proposal for partnership and the conference agenda according to Indian market requirements.-Worked in a team of 3 people, creating Go to Market Strategy and proposals for the social sector organizations.-Scheduled 3 5 weekly Expert talks to understand the market needs and get feedback-Implemented new website, created dynamic web pages, and handled email marketing campaign using CRM tools

experience.title: Design Sprint Challenge

I worked 13+ hours a day on the project to make online courses more interactive and increase the completion rate. Presented the final pitch and won the best team award, conpleting the program with distinction.

experience.title: Delegate of India
experience.description: I was selected from the pool of 5 Lacs applicants to attend the World Youth Forum. Being the youngest delegate from India, I got the chance to interact with people from 164+ countries. My key takeaways are- Active participation in the workshop by UNIDO on the fourth industrial revolution- Took part in the WYF labs focused on the start-up culture around the world and innovations-Interacted with 25+ global startups and learned about their process- Discussed international relations and diplomat bonds
